Let me not have spent my riches
but without this friendship I feel poor
Though I will still reflect on what we had
and all of the potential...

songs.title: Someday
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics by M. Mixon]

Some nights it really gets to me
and this right now is killing me

Unsure as forever
With eyes so wide
It's as clear as day

A wavering frightened glance
Promise not to cry
One tear's released the flood
Sorrow blinks to brightness of day

Be strong
I faked a smile
that crumbled
under Sunday morning's sky

Apologize
10,000 times
for days run over forever
in my mind

But middle ground has given way
and where to step is now
what I face

No one to have
No hand to hold

I suppress my position
as a means to silence the truth

Tormented by my every undying devotion to you
I cry terrified the truth will never calm
But for now if I can just push on and forget
all will be alright

songs.title: The Commentator's Despair
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics by M. Mixon]

Reflection in her tears
I can still feel that sigh
of relief

Confided in Me
I feel safe in your arms

The picture in her mind
with the reinented fear that had long since settled
deep in her inside

I wish I knew
your feelings

I cannot catch the depth
I can merely scratch the surface
Are your dreams sweet?
filled with all those precious memories
of the spirit you've destroyed
Contracted, is a most horrifying infection
That's robbed security and destroyed trust

My hear burns true
I am forever changed
The sun is black
and I am ashamed

Like her, this will never leave me
Oh precious memories

songs.title: The Afternoon
songs.lyrics: [Instrumental]

songs.title: Away With Words
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics by M. Mixon]

You have given me
a window into
my own inner human spirit
and it's warmed my hear

Like the powerless hand of a helpless child
here I am
afraid to touch the light i've felt inside

I'll see to it that this breath of doubt
will be the last I'll ever draw
I ask only to act upon
the beliefs I've so strongly spoken

I'm disgusted and insulted with myself

And with every brave step forward I can
justify the sacrifice

I belong to you
Be with me now

songs.title: Dandelion
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics by T. Rios]

She awaits far more the smell of dandelion
Love dripping with blood
A mask to cover her hate
and a hand to cover the mouth
He bites away at her face
like cracks to concrete she breaks
Like concrete to dracks she remains
In still life frame covered in dust
a perfumed love sickens to his eyes
She gently strokes the heartache he lives for
And pounds a beating rhythm agains hers
as the walls still drip with blood
Off her hands shielding the face
of tears that endlessly love...
Warning arms of compassion through
blue skies of desperate lies
As concrete to fists tonight rains
bloodshed
She dies...

songs.title: Arcardia Fades
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics by R. Morgan, J. Logan]

Tonight will be a long night
I fight my sinking eyelids
so I can watch
her dreaming of the last safe place
Feather floors for bare feet

Without even the first idea
she will be lost to me
I barely believe I let it be
I will have to see
that she will be lost to me
I didn't mean it as a lie
When I promised to be your contender

An air stream of doubt cut me apart
Every feather blown away
It's going to be hard
On her soft feet

Jhazmyne needs her sleep
just as badly as me
Jhazmyne needs to sleep

I know you'll make it
Be strong I love you

songs.title: Silent Deaths, Crowded Lives
songs.lyrics:
[Lyrics by T. Rios]

With plastic face designs
covered over a hell infested you
Your fingerprints marked in blood
Helpless to save you
Useless to name
Useless to purify
a lingering sin
In rubber rooms that float
Every bounding speck a memoir
Your devoted laughter silence

No one listens

A world full of ears become deaf
They scratch at the scars
but blood still drips from their eyes

With plastic face design
We become fools to your lies
Hopeless to save
Useless to name
Your every desire to die

songs.title: Jhazmyne's Lullaby
songs.lyrics: [Instrumental]

Until The Day Breathes And The Shadows F.name: Until The Day Breathes And The Shadows Flee

songs.title: Silent Deaths, Crowded Lives
songs.lyrics:
With plastic face designs
Covered over a hell infested you
The fingerprints marked in blood
Helpless to save you
Useless to purify a lingering sin
In rubber rooms that float.

Every bouncing speck a memoir
Your devoted laughter silence
No one listens
A world full of ears become deaf
They scratch at the scars
But blood drips from their eyes.

With plastic face design
We become fools to your lies
Hopeless to save
Useless to name
Your every desire to die.

songs.title: Dandelion
songs.lyrics:
She awaits far more the smell of dandelion
Love dripping with blood
A mask to cover her hate
and a hand to cover the mouth

He bites away at her face
Like cracks to concrete she breaks
Like concrete to cracks she remains
In still life frame covered in dust

A perfumed love sickens to his eyes
She gently strokes the heartache
He lives for
And pounds a beating rhythm against hers

As the walls still drip with blood
Off her hands shielding the face
Of tears that endlessly love...

Warming arms of compassion through
Blue skies of desperate lies
As concrete to fists tonight rains bloodshed
She dies...

songs.title: Sweet Princess Thief
songs.lyrics:
Sweet angel laughter echoes eternally like a white rose
You've drained the red for my love
You've plucked the thorns which stab me and let me bleed from pain and suffering
Your life compares to no higher form alive
My princess, my savior in the night

With a kiss I've awakened from death
My love, which steals from the richest garden
Leaving flowers that surround where I rest
I accuse you as my thief, my guardian angel
Delivers all these gifts and hides away

But when you mark that precious kiss
I feel the love that soaks into my life
I've been blessed from the heavens
With the song of her wings
I'm convinced

songs.title: Until The Day Breathes And The Shadows Flee
songs.lyrics: [Instrumental]

songs.title: A Farewell To A Perfect Score
songs.lyrics:
I feel ill with words of repentance and love
I could never forget what it felt like
To feel my heart drop and watch
As hungry insects swarmed around it and
fed off like a disease to a diagnosed patient

You no longer see me
What am I doing but holding back tears
And thinking of you, with this tainted image of me
With no longer love, but disappointment
I'm still here, I just forgot I was human for a second

And that I can't just be some image
I have error, I long to hear your voice again
Untainted with openness
I'm sorry for what I have done
I'm sorry, what have I done?

And for what I have done I am truly sorry
Words for you are like my pot of gold
Let me not have spent my riches
But without this friendship I feel poor

Though I will still reflect on what we had
And all of the potential...

songs.title: To The Gates
songs.lyrics:
[Talking:]

We are called to fight for Your name
To take up our crosses and to follow
As servants of God we will stand to fight
Only by our faith will we prevail

Legions of demons raise up against us
We will not falter, we'll stand our ground

 [Chorus:]

The earth will tremble
Hear this battle cry
The earth will tremble
Take up your arms now

Face to face with the enemy, drive the sword into his flesh
Blood and sweat run down his face, tears of pain and agony
To the gates of hell we ride tonight
Every last one will be brought to his knees
Burn the last bones, slay the stealer of souls

 [Chorus]

Burn forever, enemy of God

Search and destroy, you'll be our prey tonight
We'll purge you all, we will burn you alive

songs.title: Redefining Moment
songs.lyrics:
A blessing, a gift like no other that I have ever held
Insert my heart in yours, forever together
Hold fast now, don't let go, take my hand and then hold your breath
We will push, we will strive harder than we ever have before

Drown in this peace, follow me and believe
Breathe in this change, though our love stays the same
And together, we will carry on

A different type of this love than we held in past days
Transition into this life anew

Drown in this peace, follow me and believe
Breathe in this change, though our love stays the same

I will not forget the day when you were revealed to me
It was a gift from above, and on that day

 [Chorus:]

I found something that I'd never known
It was a redefining moment in our lives
And forever I won't let it go
It was a redefining moment in our lives

And from this day forward, we will carry on

songs.title: It Is Not The End
songs.lyrics:
We are consumed by this life
Strangled by wordly struggles
Over and over again, life's trials try to break us down
We will not give in this time
Frustration, temptation

So we lift our eyes up to the sky
Reminded of Your wounds that set us free
Broken and bloodied you hung on that cross

And now with hands around my neck
I know that You are still with me

I trust Your ways, I am Yours
I am nothing, without my faith in Your hands
I stumble to the ground

Broken and bloodied you hung on that cross

Take heed O my child, eternity draws near

 [Talking:]

My earthly senses vanish like smoke, drifting up into the air
Breath escapes my lungs, never to enter again
My life flickers and is gone, like the wind upon a candle
Time exists only in memory yet I am aware
The world and its cares fall behind me
I am seperated from flesh, but it is not the end.
At this my heart pounds and leaps from its place
I feel a warmth that I have never known surrounding and comforting me
I am bathed in a radiant light pure and welcoming
The voices of angels resonate in every direction
As my visions clears I see not my earthly shell, but a new and perfect existence
And in this moment there is peace as I step forward towards the open arms of my King.

Where O death is your sting?
Where O grave is your destruction?

songs.title: Divine Amnesty
songs.lyrics:
[lyrics by Kyle Wood]

To what end will our foolish ways lead?
Shall we be consumed by Your holy wrath and reap our deserved fate?
O my God, come down in power, engulf this man in the cleansing winds of Your unceasing mercy.
Let adoration rise within me; liberate Your creation.

Who is a God like You, pardoning iniquity and passing over transgression for the remnant of His inheritance?
He does not retain His anger forever, because He delights in steadfast love.
He will tread our iniquities underfoot.

You will cast all our sins into the depths of the sea, as You have sworn to our fathers from the days of old.

songs.title: Phumis: The Falsehood Of Affliction
songs.lyrics:
[lyrics by JJ "Shiv" Polachek IV]

Did you think it was fruit that brought the fall
The deception of an outside hand
The decision of a malevolent god

This curse is not a curse
This legacy of sin
Is all just a reaction
This bane of our humanity
Is our humanity itself

Blame the plague
Fuel the detractors of the cure
If this is a curse from a god
Then what morality is there in worship

This is us
There is no sin
There is only man
We can only hurt
We can only steal
We can only cheat
We can only kill
(When there is no celestial provider)

Forsaken a benevolent creator
Reaping what we have truly earned
We are not afflicted
We are merely on our own

There is no magic infecting your soul
There is only what you have done
We have hurt to survive
We have lied to reach respite
We are the consequences
Of our human weakness
And our damnation is our own

songs.title: The Hill Difficulty
songs.lyrics:
[lyrics by JJ "Shiv" Polachek IV]

Growing tired of the void
Sickened by the concept of relinquishing autonomy
The path to enlightenment inclines
Constantly, never giving way to respite
There is no meadow of regeneration

The is The Hill Difficulty
This is the Mount of Worth
There is no spiral path to the summit
There is no other existential meaning greater than the view from the peak

The higher I ascend, the more vague the foundation becomes
The higher I ascend, the greater my view of the cities I left behind

O' God of Obscurity, deliver me into brilliance
Bathe me in the light of the outer-truth
Give me the perception of the Saints and the Exorcists
Carry me to the Summit of Infinity

No voice from the heavens to reply
No hand of the Host to seize me
Only a whisper in the Gale
Ambiguous, but so real
("The greatest struggle begets the greatest catharsis")

Within the throes of absolution
I shed my humanity
I rise beyond angles to the company of Saints

songs.title: Cycle Of Self
songs.lyrics:
[lyrics by Kyle Wood]

Time and time again, I have tasted defeat.
The works of my hands disgrace Your name.
But yet I still depend on your feeble mind.
Overhead a dark cloud covers the sky.
Breeding this pain that will consume my life.
Pushing onward without You.
Stagnant cycle repeats.
Choke the air, kill the man.

Each step I take in Your name gives birth to a new life.
Every step alone brings pain tenfold.
Forgive me.
In Your perfect love, I am made complete.
Pour out Your mercy.

songs.title: Delusions
songs.lyrics:
[lyrics by Kyle Wood]

At the foot of the hills, I strain to see what lies ahead.
My own hand blind my eyes.
My soul longs to scale this mountainside, but my body fails to continue.
Fearing this plague that I have born, I cower to hide form the light.
Back into the mire, crawling deep inside the dim embrace of my delusive savior.
The wolves of my addiction are unleashed.
Tear through my flesh and shatter my bones, this body is nothing.

Upon this mount strikes a mighty hand.
The heavens open up, into Your hands I am risen.
Pulled away, this poison is purged.

Though the enemy will scheme to bring eternal destruction, it is in Christ alone that I have been set free.

songs.title: A Finite Grasp Of Infinite Disillusion
songs.lyrics:
[lyrics by JJ "Shiv" Polachek IV]

Seeking something beyond the stars
Irreverent to laws and restrictions

I've seen the darkness
I know it's there
I don't care how it bends the light

The point is that the light exists

This light has a strange nature
This light doesn't care what I think
This light will carry me to the truth
All I care about is knowing what that means

You can call it God
Call it an anomaly

I don't know how it functions
All I know is what I've seen

I am not a teacher
I am in nobody's crusade
I am just a seeker
Fighting in this war against obscurity

And I'm not seeking a defense
Some kind of apologetic ammunition
I don't need the discourse of dogma against angst
This is not a showcase of intellect or rebellion

This is the battle for perception
This is the struggle of knowing the truth
This is what happens when
I can no longer only trust myself
Let alone put my faith in you

songs.title: Vindicator
songs.lyrics:
[lyrics by Kyle Wood]

Save me, O God, for the water have come up to my neck.
I sink in the miry depths, where there is no foothold.
I have come into the deep waters; the floods engulf me.
Fear and trembling have beset me, horror has overwhelmed me.
I am worn out calling for help, my throat is parched.
My heart is in anguish with me; the terrors of death assail me.

Many are my enemies without cause; those who seek to destroy me.
They sharpen their tongues like swords, and aim their words like deadly arrows.
When they draw the bow, let their arrows be blunted.
O Lord, how many are my foes!
But You are a shield around me, O Lord; You bestow glory on me.

I cry aloud, and He answers me.
I will not fear the tens of thousands drawn up against me.

songs.title: The Winnowing
songs.lyrics:
[lyrics by Kyle Wood]

How can we justify this selfishness?
Is it not us who continue to kiss His cheek?
Don't shun responsibility and cast the blame upon others.
Spineless decisions are symptomatic of a greater infirmity.

Nation unified, now cursed and divided.
Blind hate bombards every side.

For the day of the Lord will come like a thief in the night.
God has not destined for us wrath, but salvation.

Desolation fills the earth, these are the final days.
Prepare for the coming of the risen Lamb.
Die to yourself, renovate your heart.

songs.title: Regeneration
songs.lyrics: [Instrumental]

songs.title: Redeemer
songs.lyrics:
I'm working hard to make it all happen
I want to get it all
I've collected all the stars in the sky
I'm at the point of no return
I need to make my choice
I'm caught between the dark and light

Did you ever reach for a shining star?

Will you return to me
Redeemer of all life
Embrace me now and take me home
Will you answer me
Redeemer of all life
Reach to us your nail scarred hand

I'm climbing higher up the ladder
I wanna see all the world
With open arms I greet the sun
I'm not afraid to fall anymore
I will raid the wings of this story
With open eyes I face all the glory

Do you always wait for it to fall in your hand?

Will you return to me
Redeemer of all life
Embrace me now and take me home
Will you answer me
Redeemer of all life
Reach to us your nail scarred hand

Why have you brought me to this place?
Why am I here if you're not with me?
Lost in this desert of despair

One time long ago you came to me
When I was lone and scared
You made me take a stand

Still I make mistakes
And give you the blame
There's nothing I could do,
That you don't already know

Will you return to me
Redeemer of all life
Embrace me now and take me home
Will you answer me
Redeemer of all life
Reach to us your nail-scarred hand

songs.title: Confession
songs.lyrics:
My soul is clouded, shallow
I need to cry, I need to die
My heart is feeble, aching
I need to breath new life

Give me a sign of the truth
I need to know and to believe
My heart is feeble, aching
I need to breath new life

Forgive me
Please ease my mind
Forgive me
Please wipe away these tears

Oh, be my guide and make me understand your ways
Oh, be my guide and take me to the way that you have made

How can I make you stay
Is there a way, to feed this fire
When will it go away?
Will it always haunt my mind

Tears of relief leave my chest
Like rain grim heavy clouds above

Never have I felt such freedom
Like in this silent prayer

Forgive me
Please ease my mind
Forgive me
Please wipe away these tears

Oh, be my guide and make me understand your ways
Oh, be my guide and take me to the way that you have made

How can I make you stay
Is there a way, to feed this fire
When will it go away?
Will it always haunt my mind

songs.title: The Darkest Winter
songs.lyrics:
I remember those days
When we used to laugh and cry
They're now more like a dream

I remember the rain
Like a picture in my mind
In a room very far away

I am trapped in darkness
The cold breeze is calling me
Am I forever caught in this winter?

Help me find a way out
I'm crying
Don't let it get to me
This coldness
It haunts my every move
This silence
There's so much life in me
Don't let me die

Long to see a new day
I feel I'm growing old
I am left all alone

My heart is pounding so weak
My spirit broken down
I'm left here with no choice

I am trapped in darkness
The cold breeze is calling me
Am I forever caught in this winter?

Help me find a way out
I'm crying
Don't let it get to me
This coldness
It haunts my every move
This silence
There's so much life in me
Don't let me die

Silence, don't say a word
There's a trace of blood on the ground that
I'm treading

Help me find a way out
Don't let it get to me
It haunts my every move
There's so much life in me

All my life I never saw that there's a way
To walk forever more
All my life I never filled the hole that was
Left in my weary soul

songs.title: Fall Again
songs.lyrics:
I walk in the light of a saviour
And my heart is pure, (the) truth is burning within me
I confess in the blood of remission
Unrighteousness is leaving me again

Time is slipping away, you're waling in the dark.
You're roaming round in fear

Oh, yes I will fall again,
But I will never fear this darkness
Oh, 'cause you are my tourniquet,
And in your name I'll pierce the darkness

I look towards the future
An earth that's calm, free from the raging sea
Our time's not remembered, not in our minds.
Even hidden from your eyes

Time is slipping away, you're walking in the dark.
You're roaming round in fear

No, I will not fall again
I won't have to face this darkness
No, I will not fall again
The voice of weeping will be no more

songs.title: Where Are You
songs.lyrics:
Always seen what I can be
Always known how to be free
Never dared o be the one
Who takes the lead to carry on

And I just cannot let go
Even though I know so well

If I dwell the depths of the sea
Your light would still reach me

Where are you?
Where are you now?
Leaving me be
You reign I can't see
Where are you?
Where are you now?
Forgive me this once
But I cannot see

And so we close our eyes
Cause we don't want to see anymore
All the pain that we bring
It's time now to heed the call

And we just cannot let go
Even though we know so well

If we dwell the depths of the sea
Your light would still reach us

Where are you?
Where are you now?
Leaving me be
Your reign I can't see
Where are you?
Where are you now?
Forgive me this once
But I cannot see

Help us to face the truth
Show us the secret of your reign
Open our eyes
Let us understand the mystery of your kingdom

songs.title: The Weight Of The World
songs.lyrics:
You cannot see what I can see
So deep within a reflection of sin

You will not be the one to see
And be in a place in judgment of me

The bringer of lies
Always beside me
You tell me to go all the way
Deceit in your eyes
How I defy you
I'm telling you to keep your distance

Dreaming
In darkness weeping
I see him reaching
I'm losing the grip
Forgetting
The hand that guides me
The world will die
If I let go of his hand

I tread your ground 'cause you tread mine
And you will pay 'cause that is what my God says

You tell me lies you bring me sorrow
Now I defy what you justify

Dreaming
In darkness weeping
I see him reaching
I'm losing the grip
Forgetting
The hand that guides me
The world will die
If I let go of his hand

What is this dream
That is haunting my sleep at night
What's this feeling,
The weight of the world

Help me to move forward
Reaching the other side
What's this feeling,
The weight of the world

songs.title: Save Me
songs.lyrics:
Alone I walk through an alley at night
Like a whisper I hear deceiving lies
The shadows are telling me to stop
There is no other way to go

Don't want to hear it
Don't want to see it
Don't want to know it
Don't want to be here

I hide my face now
I will deny it
I can not fight now
I can't believe

The pain
In this damnation game
Eternal fears
Throughout all the world

Endless tears
For thousands of years
We fear the old
The ancient dragon

I couldn't believe what he had done
And now I'm doing just the same
I feel the burden in my heart
I wish I could have it all undone

I want to hear it
I want to see it
I want to know it
I want to be there

I show my face now
I won't deny it
I will fight forever
I believe

Save me
Bleed for me
Breathe in me
I know you can hear me
Save me
Take my pain
Pray for me
I know you can see me

When darkness falls
All over me again
I will be there
I won't deny his name

Save me
Bleed for me
Breathe in me
I know you can hear me
Save me
Take my pain
Pray for me
I know you can see me

songs.title: With You Forever
songs.lyrics:
I've tried to run away from you
I've tried to hide my face from you
I've tried to be what I am not
But now I see that I am lost

I've tried to walk that extra mile
I've tried to reach above the sun
But I always look at what I have
Don't want to lose it all again

See me as I am
No, not more
Take me for what I am

Call my name and save me
Wanna be with you forever
Wake me up, console me
Wanna be with you forever
Wanna be with you forever

Go ahead break me one more time
Go ahead and kill me one more time
Go ahead and drown me one more time
Don't want to lose it all again

See me as I am
No, not more
Take me for what I am

Call my name and save me
Wanna be with you forever
Wake me up, console me
Wanna be with you forever
Wanna be with you forever
I wanna be with you forever

Call ma name and save me
Wanna be with you forever
Wake me up, console me
Wanna be with you forever

songs.title: Wisdom Calls
songs.lyrics:
[originally by Veni Domine]

Wisdom calls aloud in the streets
Hear her raising her voice in the squares
How long will you simple ones
Love your evil ways

Turn around and listen to my rebuke
And I will pour out my spirit on you
Turn around and listen to my rebuke
And I will let you hear my words

As the moon turns to blood
So many will understand
As the seals are breaking one by one
Hear my words - hear the wisdom call

For you wouldn't hear when I cried
And you didn't react when I reached out my hand to you
As you let my advice drain away
And you didn't accept my rebuke

Therefore shall I smile when your day has come
And despise you when things that you fear are near
When your fear comes like a storm
There will be anguish and pain

Then they will call to me but I shall not answer
They will look for me but nothing will be found
Since they hated knowledge and did not choose to fear the lord
They would not accept my advice and spurred my rebuke

They will eat the fruit of their ways
And be filled with the wine of their schemes
But the one who listens to me
He will live in security

And be sheltered against the curse of death
Wisdom calling me

songs.title: Through Dark And Light
songs.lyrics: [Instrumental]

songs.title: Into Forever
songs.lyrics:
[Thomas Vikström]

I call your name
When I turn off the light,
I say your name
When we enter the night

 [Caroline Sigfridsson]

No I won't pretend
That I don't have my doubts
No I'll face the end
With fear in my eyes

 [Bridge:]

 [Thomas]
What should I do

 [Caroline]
to find you?

 [Thomas]

I see pitfalls everywhere
Where is the path

 [Caroline]
That holds you

 [Thomas]
And that I'm searching for?

 [Chorus 1:]

From my fate I cannot flee
Through dark and light
I've always strayed

 [Guitar lead: Markus]

 [Caroline Sigfridsson]

Oh it has been said
The truth shall set you free
But we lie and we pray
Into the dark we flee

 [Bridge:]

 [Thomas]
What should I do

 [Caroline]
to find you?

 [Thomas]

I see pitfalls everywhere
Where is the path

 [Caroline]
That holds you

 [Thomas]
And that I'm searching for?

 [Chorus 2:]

In solitude I make my way
Through dark and light
Into forever

 [Caroline Sigfridsson]

What is your goal?
What is your purpose?
Blindly you follow for promised land...

 [Guitar & keyboard solos: Markus & Kaspar]

 [Chorus 3:]

 [Thomas & Caroline]

From my fate I cannot flee
Through dark and light
I've always strayed

 [Thomas]

In solitude I make my way
Through dark and light
Into forever

 [Thomas & Caroline]

From my fate I cannot flee
Through dark and light
I've always strayed

 [Thomas]

In solitude I make my way
Through dark and light
Into forever

songs.title: The Innocence In Me
songs.lyrics:
[Thomas Vikström]

Hope is fading away
A storm is coming to stay
Where have you gone?
A new place to stay
A chance to break free

 [Christian Liljegren]

It's not the end of our days
Won't you come back to me?
Have you found your way
Out of this maze
Why can't I find it?

 [Guitar solo: Markus]

 [Christian Liljegren]

Across the sea and beyond
With white wings I can see you fly
You search to be free
Wherever you go
I need what you see

 [Bridge: Thomas]

You wander through green pastures
Walk through the valley of the shadow of death
You have found the way
You fear nothing more
Is this not for me?

 [Chorus 1: Thomas]

Now let me see what you have found this time
Show me the way how to be glory bound
Now let me feel what you can feel inside
And let me near all that you hold so dear

 [Christian Liljegren]

Help me know no fear
What is it that you hold so dear
Can you give me more
To help me endure
And restore my soul

 [Bridge: Thomas]

You wander through green pastures
Walk through the valley of the shadow of death
You have found the way
You fear nothing more
Is this not for me?

 [Chorus 1: Thomas]

Now let me see what you have found this time
Show me the way how to be glory bound
Now let me feel what you can feel inside
And let me near all that you hold so dear

 [Keyboard solo: Kaspar]

 [Thomas Vikström]

Now let me fall through time
Let me fall through sorrow
Now let me fall when no one can hear my call
Away from pain and greed
Away from hate and sin
Now let me fall one step for every tear I've cried...
For every tear I've cried!!!

 [Guitar & keyboard solos: Markus & Kaspar]

 [Chorus 2: Caroline]

Will we ever see what our lives could be
Will we ever find our meaning in life... Oh!
I have found in you the innocence in me
The innocence in me is you...

 [Everybody]

Will we ever see what our lives could be
Will we ever find our meaning in life
Will we ever see what our lives could be
Will we ever find our meaning in life

 [Caroline]

I have found in you the innocence in me
The innocence in me is you...

 [Guitar solo: Markus]

 [Chorus 3]

Will we ever see what our lives could be
Will we ever find our meaning in life
Will we ever see what our lives could be
Will we ever find our meaning in life

songs.title: You Hold The Key
songs.lyrics:
[Thomas Vikström]

Dark, dark is your mind
Fear, fear holds your name
Running through a life that's clear
Hearing stories that don't seem to mean a thing

 [Chorus:]

 [Caroline]

We hold the key to every door
And at the end
Will we see that there was so much more

 [Thomas]

You hold the key
To open all doors

 [Thomas Vikström]

Obscure, obscure are your thoughts
Cold, cold is your mind
Claiming that nothing you fear
Giving in in pain and you're free again

 [Chorus:]

 [Caroline]

We hold the key to every door
And at the end

 [Thomas]

Will we see that there was so much more
You hold the key
To open all doors

 [Thomas Vikström]

Miracles, they never come your way
Miracles, won't happen by themselves

 [Guitar & keyboard solos: Markus & Kaspar]

 [Chorus: Caroline Sigfridsson]

We hold the key to every door
And at the end
Will we see that there was so much more
We hold the key to every door
And at the end
Will we see that there was so much more

We hold the key...

songs.title: Enter A Dream
songs.lyrics:
[Thomas Vikström]

Necessary evil and necessary pain
Sold every day
In the name of justice
They will seek to drain
Their will by God

 [Bridge 1: Thomas]

The scale of balance
Will never be even
Justice was never there
Like in an illusion
We play truth or dare
Winning is all
In the eyes of the world

 [Chorus:]

 [Thomas]

Tear down all fences to see my aim
Bring this dying world into oblivion

 [Erik]
Within a dream of another world

 [Thomas]
Where all I live for still remain

 [Erik Tordsson]

Why would I want to be just like you?
Dressed in false ideals
Your spell now's broken
Now that you are gone
Your voice unheard

 [Bridge 1: Erik]

The scale of balance
Not an illusion
Winning is all
In the eyes of the world

 [Chorus:]

 [Thomas]
Tear down all fences to see my aim

 [Erik]

Bring this dying world into oblivion
Within a dream of another world

 [Thomas]
Where all I live for still remain

 [Guitar & keyboard solos: Markus & Kaspar]

 [Thomas Vikström]

And as the pain grows
Your true identity comes clear
Through lands of decay you run
And the passion has you released

 [Guitar lead: Markus]

 [Chorus:]

 [Erik]
Tear down all fences to see my aim

 [Thomas]
Bring this dying world into oblivion

 [Erik]
Within a dream of another world

 [Thomas & Erik]
Where all I live for still remain

songs.title: Crossing
songs.lyrics: [Instrumental]

songs.title: We Cry No More
songs.lyrics:
[Thomas Vikström]

You, you ride the winds of fury
You, you steal and kill for glory

 [Bridge: Thomas]

You search your crown
Stealing mercy is really your doom

 [Chorus:]

 [Thomas]

No we cry no more
No we stray no more

 [Caroline]

No we cry no more
No more wasted tears

 [Thomas Vikström]

You, you ride your dreams so far
You, you hate in the name of your god

 [Bridge: Thomas]

You search your crown
Stealing mercy is really your doom

 [Chorus:]

 [Thomas]

No we cry no more
No we stray no more

 [Caroline]

No we cry no more
No more wasted tears

 [Caroline]
In times of need

 [Thomas]
In times of need

 [Caroline]
You always run and hide, oh

 [Thomas]
Yeah...

 [Caroline]
Into your creed

 [Thomas]
Into your creed

 [Caroline]
You never will be free

 [Thomas]
You never will be free

 [Caroline]
No you will never be saved by your deeds

 [Guitar & keyboard solos: Markus & Kaspar]

 [Chorus:]

 [Thomas]

No we cry no more
No we stray no more

 [Caroline]

No we cry no more
No more wasted tears, yeah

songs.title: Under The Sun
songs.lyrics:
[Thomas Vikström]

Why do we feed on sin?

 [Lead: Markus & Kaspar]

 [Christian Liljegren]

Made out of clay
To end up in fire
Our human kind
Destined to find

 [Bridge: Thomas Vikström]

Of all things how can we
In this ocean of lies
Give up the true meaning
For our ego

 [Chorus: Caroline Sigfridsson]

I accept that some things
Under the sun
Are not meant to be understood

 [Thomas Vikström]

But why, why do we feed on sin?

 [Christian Liljegren]

Ashes to ashes
And dust back to dust
A human mind
Destined to find

 [Bridge: Thomas Vikström]

Of all things how can we
In this ocean of lies
Give up the true meaning
For our ego

 [Chorus: Caroline Sigfridsson]

I accept that some things
Under the sun
Are not meant to be understood

 [Keyboard & guitar solos: Kaspar & Markus]

 [Chorus: Caroline Sigfridsson]

I accept that some things
Under the sun
Are not meant to be understood
I accept that some things
Under the sun
Are not meant to be understood

songs.title: Scattered Mind
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus:]

I will not be the one
You will not see me run
For cover away from you
But I will find the way

 [Keyboard solo: Kaspar]

What brings them the right
To tell us what is wrong
What brings them the right
To be offended by those words

 [Bridge:]

You're casting your pearls before the swine
Where do you find
Time and the strength to pull it through?

 [Chorus:]

No, I will not be the one
You will not see me run
For cover away from you
But I will find the way

I cling to what you said
Somehow I feel it's true
No matter what they say,
I refuse to run no more

 [Bridge:]

You're casting your pearls before the swine
Where do you find
Time and the strength to make it through?

 [Chorus:]

No, I will not be the one
You will not see me run
For cover away from you
But I will find the way

I have found myself
Now that you are gone
I am not grieving for you
I have opened the door

 [Guitar & keyboard solos: Markus & Kaspar]

 [Chorus:]

No, I will not be the one
You will not see me run
For cover away from you
But I will find the way

 [Keyboard solo: Kaspar]

No, I will not be the one...

songs.title: Final Wisdom
songs.lyrics:
[Thomas Vikström]

Dead of the night
Only emptiness
Surrounds us there

Cry into the light
Longing for the mystery
That we one knew

Now so far away
From my childhood longing
Where is the embrace
That I once knew?
Now so far away
A conflict grown within
Where is the embrace
My faith on the edge

The light is fading
A dark desire
And with it my faith
Like raging fire
Dividing powers
In ancient riddles
Bringing balance
Of good and evil

 [Bridge 1: Christian Liljegren]

Why, why are you so afraid?
You wish you could turn back time

 [Chorus:]

 [Thomas]
We all see the final wisdom

 [Caroline]
We all will kneel in fear of freedom

 [Thomas]
We all will reach the final frontier

 [Caroline]
We all will see a new dawn rising

 [Christian Liljegren]

Echoes from the past
Fools your future
Enter the gate
Of a dead empire

 [Violin lead]

 [Christian Liljegren]

You're cast out
Your crown has been taken
You don't belong
Among the sacred

 [Thomas Vikström]

You're cast out
Your crown has been taken
You don't belong
Among the sacred

 [Guitar solo: Markus]

 [Thomas Vikström]

Now traded places
We carry on
Misled by the lies
Into new dimensions
Again I fail you
I am so tired
Give me the strength
To hold the fire

 [Bridge 2: Christian Liljegren]

Why, why am I so afraid
To do what my heart desire

 [Chorus:]

 [Thomas]
We all see the final wisdom

 [Caroline]
We all will kneel in fear of freedom

 [Thomas]
We all will reach the final frontier

 [Caroline]
We all will see a new dawn rising

 [Guitar & keyboard solos: Markus & Kaspar]

 [Christian Liljegren]

I, I am the hunter and you, so obvious my prey
You, you better see me, you
You better kneel before me

 [Thomas Vikström]

I am waiting, I am waiting for a blood-red sky
I am waiting, I am waiting for a sign to come

 [Guitar & keyboard lead: Markus & Kaspar]

 [Erik Tordsson]

Oh, I must take my place in the crowd
Oh, I must leave my past far behind

 [Caroline Sigfridsson]

I am waiting, I am waiting for a blood-red sky
I am waiting, I am waiting for a sign to come

 [Thomas Vikström]

Will you watch over me at night?
Will you follow my steps tomorrow?

(I've opened the gate to your realm,
You will be the lord of my dreams)

 [Caroline Sigfridsson]

I feel the winter come
It brings me down in despair
I wish the spring would come
So I could meet you there

 [Thomas Vikström]

I feel the winter come
It brings me down in despair
Yeah, I wish the spring would come
So I could meet you there

 [Chorus:]

 [Thomas]
We all see the final wisdom

 [Caroline]
We all will kneel in fear of freedom

 [Thomas]
We all will reach the final frontier

 [Caroline]
We all will see a new dawn rising
We all see...
We all will kneel...
We all will reach...
We all will see...

 [Keyboard solo: Kaspar]

 [Thomas Vikström]

Storms and disasters will come my way
But I will never give up on the path that I aim

 [Guitar lead: Markus]

 [Thomas Vikström]

Time will move on but I am heading the right way
I wait for spring and then a bright summer day

Storms and disasters will come my way
I will never give up on the path that I aim
Storms and disasters will come my way... come my way...
I will never give up on the path that I aim

songs.title: What Matters
songs.lyrics:
[Thomas Vikström]

When I am by myself
I feel sceptic to the word
When you are by my side
I feel a doubt grow in my heart

And when I think of you
I feel a sorrow in my soul
And when I talk to you
The voice inside is gone

 [Bridge: Christian Liljegren]

Angel of sorrow
My lonely ghost of grief
Your pain I borrow
You bring me no relief

 [Chorus: Thomas & Caroline]

What matters in the end?
My faith?
Oh what is true?

 [Thomas Vikström]

I hear destructive words
Bringing me creative thoughts
A book of history
Contradictive ideals

It feeds upon my soul
It bleeds me from within
And in the end what matters
What is true, is true

 [Bridge: Christian Liljegren]

Angel of sorrow
My lonely ghost of grief
Your pain I borrow
You bring me no relief
Angel of sorrow
My lonely ghost of grief
Your pain I borrow
You bring me no relief

 [Chorus: Thomas & Caroline]

What matters in the end?
My faith?
Oh what is true?

 [Guitar solo: Markus]

 [Thomas Vikström]

Break me down, set me free
What you think is best for me
Break new ground and walk away
My belief is now astray

Oh, the silence
Oh, this silence kills me
Oh, the fire
Oh, this fire burns me

 [Bridge: Christian Liljegren]

Angel of sorrow
My lonely ghost of grief
Your pain I borrow
You bring me no relief
Angel of sorrow
My lonely ghost of grief
Your pain I borrow
You bring me no relief

 [Chorus:]

What matters in the end?
My faith?
Oh what is true?
What matters in the end?
My faith?
Oh what is true?
What matters in the end?
My faith?
Oh what is true?
What matters in the end?
My faith?
Oh what is true?

songs.title: Love, Sweet Death
songs.lyrics:
Red sand over my hands,
suddenly it's gone, I feel the heat of sun
and it's hard to believe
things come and go in one beat
it's so hard to achieve
I need to hear your cry

Once I lived one life and breathed
love makes you feel in one pit
where light fades in
It used to be right until we corssed
the line of fear and doubts
broke all we built

Madness can destroy it all
even the strongest love can reach a point
when nobody knows what's right or wrong

Just feel the time goes by
I've reached the limit inside
black shadows that come
and you don't know where to hide at all

Feel the strenght death has
that scratches inside your soul
see if it's worth it, no one decides
you have the last word

I'm here, still in this shore
asking why, all that I hear is the storm
it's still hard to believe,
no one hears my claims
should I turn back and keep
that sweet thing in my hands

songs.title: The Eternal Flight
songs.lyrics:
Sometimes I feel I'm going down...
It seems so hard to take it out...

And when appears it's like I was walking through the sun...
It burns and crawls inside my mind...
Down on my knees, immerse in broken silence
breathing the stagnant air, this time I'm dying

Down on my knees, drowned in my own sadness
keeping my fears away, this time I'm dying...
Your breath's still alive...
and falls from heavenly skies...

This time I feel his eyes staring in the dark...
a frozen blow of air invades my broken heart...

And when I turn around and see it's an empty cloud...
my soul gets weak, I want to join the Eternal Flight...

I'll be there, close to him, while the stars take care of me...
Silently, holding his cold and forgotten tomb...
Lying down in the night, with the only help of sorrow
slowly I dig by his side, now the flight starts...

Down on my knees, immerse in broken silence
breathing the stagnant air, this time I'm flying.....

Down on my knees, drowned in my own sadness
going across the sky, this is the Final Flight...

songs.title: I'm The King Again
songs.lyrics:
Oooh... listen to my voice...
I'm here by your side, with fear...

In this nightmare... coldness,
figures standing in my dreams...
are no fantasy...

Death... screams... loneliness...
this is what I lived... I'm back

Fear involves me... trembling,
shadows moving all around
I hear the uncounscience call...

Come!! don't hide and show me
your tremendous strenght,
Is this what you were meant to be?
take my life and live it as you want to,
I'll hear all what you want to say...

Dying brings you so much calm, suffering and lust
in this hidden world, everything gets dark...
finally I succeed, and I'm back again
this was then my place of sacrifice...

Come!! don't hide and show me
your tremendous strenght,
just tell me who you think you are?
take my life and live it as you want to,
you try to scare me with your past...

I'll show you all the blood I spread
and death purposes in my head
now it's your turn to feel the knife
don't pray to save your soul, you are lost...

Now... I'm the king again and I...
feel the highest power in my skin...

I'm in darkness, it's my end...

songs.title: Land Of Rain
songs.lyrics:
Standing behind all these stoned feelings
life passes by through my eyes...

Time after time old spirits come to me
bring me those anceint dreams...

In this suburb, tears keep falling from the sky
nights that howl like hungy wolves wake me up again...
Feel the attraction, all those bright stars
shinning high, they keep burning in my land...

Years have passed, all seemed to me beauty
white thoughts are now taking form...

One big suitcase full of deep illusions
left all I had and took the flight of hope and faith...

In this suburb, tears keep falling from the sky
nights that howl like hungy wolves wake me up again...
Feel the attraction, all those bright stars
shinning high, they keep burning in my land...

Now you have what you deserve
then you spoilt your chance and now see
there's no hope try to create your own life

What you get is what you need
thousands of times I tried to convince myself...

In this suburb, tears keep falling from the sky
nights that howl like hungy wolves wake me up again...
Feel the attraction, all those bright stars
shinning high, they keep burning in my land...

songs.title: The Shine Of The Unknown
songs.lyrics:
Far away exists a bewitched land
where all seems to be unreal
once I crossed the wide abyss
took the flight to the unknown

Down this tunnel I can see the light
in the end all is peace and calm...

Now i know there's something else...
I'm here roaming like a castaway

First thing you may feel is that you're dreaming
but suddenly you hardly realise that's not correct
deep down you are awake
and you hear your speedy heart beats
Am I daying or does it mean I must leave this place?

Lies..

That's what humans believe...

I love being so far away...

Down this tunnel I can see the light
in the end all is peace and calm...

Stop, you're still on time to think
what you prefer to live
all you can see is fuckin' real
it's up to you now

How i could explain what I feel inside,
as all my words will vanish in the end of time,
I believe... in the power of the beyond,
as in this land the sorrow seems to be alone

There's only one way to go away
just concentrate your soul
take tight my hands and think
it's happening now

In case you want to go, you have to desire it
from the bottom of your soul
no one can help you anymore
you decide if your adventure has a good end
or if you prefer... to remain in the beyond

songs.title: The Mermaid Chant
songs.lyrics:
Take tight my hand and come
now it's your chance, try it...
don't be afraid and jump...
the never-ending starts
holds you in its arms...

Down here you'll find the most exciting...
here you'll find my treasure...
and just look how the bright blue
ocean gives you its light...

Turning back to your world,
now there is no way...
that's the price to pay for curious...
now you belong to our race
just forget your legs and your previous life...

Let your body be swept away by the waves
and think this is a dream from which
you will never wake up...
Cannot believe this embodiment
my lips get damp with the salt
all I can see is strange for me
this land is the dream all would like to live,
but I'm caught

songs.title: Man Lives Apart
songs.lyrics:
When full moon shines up high
I can feel the fear inside,
then all my bones get paralyzed

You try then silently,
to get stuck to your own bed
but your deep strenght arises
and you can't stop the pain...
feel you're the only one who can stop
your rage inside... you see your nails...
man lives apart...

Now I feel the rage inside,
no one is sabed enough
there's just no place to hide
the massacre has just began...

Victims are there defenceless...

I'll hurry up, I'll be there on time
to arrive and keep your hunger back

Feel this nightmare you live
and leave me in peace
no, give up your efforts
no one can stop me now

I'll be here by your side
all I pretend is bringing calm
destroy the wild beast that lives inside

Blood falling down my cheek
I'll blame the full moon up high
I'd never dare to think
I would become such a beast

When morning's dawn kindly appears
I'll take your insane hand, I'll be free...

Feel the morning has come
my body gets weak, I won't be a man
until night closes in
and takes out my soul, nobody can see
no one realises the rage I feel

Destroying my mind
expecting my will
belonging to death...
and taking my life...

Regrets apart, I wish I could
take out my fear that lives inside
give me more time, it's what I need
I don't want to hurt yourself

I'll try to keep all my faith
to remain even now you're awake

songs.title: Forsaken
songs.lyrics:
Quenched by the cyanide of all insanities,
My thirst has come to be more pungent
Oh, heart-blinded orphans!
This is a brave new dead world
Thus, Father, you are no more

Seeking eternity lost
Infamous and foolish act
Of your vile treachery
Oh, exquisite decay
No great prospects
Denial as unique legacy

Crowning creatures of emptiness
Teaching the homily of disgrace
Falling! Perdition be my guide
Sacred are the pleasures of failure

Bred with the arsenic of all sick fantasies
This is a revolting world
Thus, Father, you were nothing

Unveiling the greatest of deceivers
Weakness and waning of the usurper
Dying! Deception be my guide
Contemptible praises of renunciation

Erratic and morbid
My visions are fading
I am the parricide
Enemy regicide
Universe's arsonist
Multitude's hypnotist
Torn in fragments
Hubris of a glorious dream

Sever the nexus
Beseech lysis
Debased!
Vain is the nisus
Herald ptosis
Decayed!

Magnified excess
Torture and oppress
Hatred manifest

Rotten by sepsis
Suffer stasis
Corrupted!
Lunacy's axis
Desecrate!

Pleasure divine
Of a weakened flesh
Recreate your world
Failure divine
Suffocating mesh
Cynic woes unfurled

Hideous whine
Suffer horrid rules
Of these blood-soaked tools
Sacrifice of yours
Feigned freedoms lures

We are the grime
We are the murder
Of what you have been
We are the crime
We are the sinner
We are your disease

Dissoluteness
Of all senses
Politics of sin
Quest laid astray

Abduction of appearances
That tear laid us bare
Searing pain to burn illusion's draperies
Sentinels of Nothingness
Shades of all Men

Revolt!
Shatter the temple of the usurper
Of negation, I am the prisoner
When misology marry misanthropy
Disgust enthrone my insanity

Devoured by all oblivions
My pain has come to be more acute

Sick fury as unique Anabasis
That initiates the palingenesis
Slaying! Subversion be my guide
Admire the ritual of your ruin

Erratic and morbid
My visions are fading
I am the parricide
Enemy regicide
Universe's arsonist
Multitude's hypnotist
Homo homini deus
Inclinatio universalis.

songs.title: Omega Dei
songs.lyrics:
All suns are slain,
As we've assassinate all of them
Praise here this catharsis,
Don't feel blamed
Rejoice! My fellows
Of this sanguinary act
As we are released from this lying tyranny

Infamy!

This murder is not crime

Felony!

But ritual sacrifice

Villainy!

That enthroned us divine

Blasphemy!

The source of a new breath!

From this supreme original sin
Our horizons shall always be reinvented
A passage to new dynamics

In violence ecstasy,
Eternal process of the conflict alchemy,
Jubilation of the demiurge,
A feast of creation,
Through strife and destruction
Chaotic pulse of life,
Majestic solar dance of will
All suns are slain,
As we've assassinate all of them
Praise here this catharsis,
Don't feel blamed
Rejoice! My fellows
Of this sanguinary act
As we are released from this lying tyranny

Infamy!

This murder is not crime

Felony!

But ritual sacrifice

Villainy!

That enthroned us divine

Blasphemy!

The source of a new breath!

Kill!

From this supreme original sin
Our horizons shall always be reinvented
A passage to new dynamics
From this maddening kill
Spoiled shall be our horizons if not reborn
Within new mechanics

A hatred called Nemesis
In mistrust of their greed
To desecrate all havens of falsehood

The gate is now so elusive
What shall be the last of our refuge?

Against all the cunnings
I'd ever rise my fist
But now wherever I seek
The eye of emptiness is staring at me

The gate is now so elusive
What shall be the last of our refuge?

Crawling within the kingdom of flies
Is my place within this idolatrous mass?

Kill!

From the abyssal monstrosities of my being
The worst of my instincts are ploughing their way
Lies to lies
Illusions again
Hate to hate

From the abyssal monstrosities of my being
The worst of my instincts are ploughing their way

Fate of a murderer

Kill!

songs.title: Moira Kai Hybris (La Chair, Le Monde Et La Machine)
songs.lyrics:
Grandness is the discord's creature
From their bloodstained madness
Was born their magnificence
Oh, little ingenuous nations lost in limbo
What shall be the rotten fruit of your act of sin?

Rise!

Foolish murderers!
Sacraments of the unnatural murder!
Destruction - Creation
Sklaverei macht fleisch!
Recreating the sense within these ruins?
Conceitedness of the resigned
Deification
Of the sinner
Unspoken discontent
Corruption in the refuge
Fleisch macht sklaverei!
A servile flesh to sharpen this new world
Old deceivers to seduce again

Imperialism
Tyranny of the blind machine
Sklaverei!
Histrionism
To snatch your words from silence
Macht !
Retribution
Cracks of the Artefacts
Fleisch!
The Idols of Reason make sacred the commands
Histrionism
To snatch existence from the night
Imperialism
Tyranny of the meaning quest

The splendours of flames only bring the desolation of ashes
Fossilized eternal precepts
Treacherous guardians of the verb
Slavery's seal to burn your flesh
Abjuration's spells envenom your flesh

Here is the outrageous!

Ophidian,
Protean,
Inordinate almightiness in action

Sooty nausea
Tragic experience of emptiness
