songs.title: Miss Fortune
songs.lyrics:
Dreams are the soul's misfortune
Meaningless and insecure
This heart could try and heal itself
But I've gone and lost the cure

songs.title: My Song
songs.lyrics:
[feat. Chad Johnson of Hundredth]

In the winter of 2010, I lost my mother to the barrel of her loaded gun
Two weeks later my forgotten dad lost the battle of his lifelong suicidal run

He was dead to me years ago
But losing her was an eternal blow
I've spoke in the past of the broken
But now I really know

If there's one thing I've learned: we're all put here to die
So why jump your turn?
I'm living day by day

There's strange comfort in apathy
I'm living day by day
There's strange comfort in apathy

Lay cold and alone in the ground
Will it be paradise or will you burn?
This is all a gamble
Until it's your turn

He was dead to me years ago
But losing her was an eternal blow
I've spoke in the past of the broken
But now I really know

Home is where the broken heart is
Home is where the broken heart is
Home is where the broken heart is
Home is where the broken heart is

Son to none
No home but the roads I roam
Son to none
No home but the roads I roam

Home is where the broken heart is
Home is where the broken heart is
We're all brokenhearted

songs.title: Skin & Bones
songs.lyrics:
These wheels are turning in my head to slowly go
Where I'd rather be instead, laying low
Skin and bones, we know
Made of stone, move slow
Move slow

These are the days
Fear takes its hold around my throat
Lost is the chase
Giving in to distance left to go, to make it home

This heart is bleeding in my chest from letting go
(I just can't stop from needing) Hope in a better place instead
Somewhere to grow (I wish we could start leaving)
Hands and feet won't move
All these things we'll lose
We'll lose

These are the days
Fear takes its hold around my throat
Lost is the chase
Giving in to distance left to go, we can go home

songs.title: Room For The Dead
songs.lyrics:
There's a battle for my soul between God, the devil, and rock 'n' roll
And when my head hits the sheets my feet will hit the ground running to heaven
Before the devil knows I'm dead

This place is a waiting room
Hoarding the diseased, waiting their turn
Sicker and sicker I wait and wait
I feel my lungs becoming numb

This place is a deadly room, culturing disease, waiting to burn
Pacing and pacing I wait and wait
I feel my legs becoming numb

D-D-D-D-Doctor I've got this lump in my throat
It's not the cigarettes that stunt my growth
There's voices inside my head, I need the medicine (I need the medicine)
D-D-D-D-Doctor I've got this lump in my throat
It's not the cigarettes that stunt my growth
There's voices inside my head, I need the medicine (I need the medicine)

Who will win the battle for my soul between God, the devil, and rock 'n' roll?
And when my head hits the sheets my feet are tired of running (and running and running)

This place is a waiting room
Hoarding the diseased, waiting their turn
Sicker and sicker I wait and wait
I feel my lungs becoming numb

This place is a deadly room, culturing disease, waiting to burn
Pacing and pacing I wait and wait
I feel my legs becoming numb

D-D-D-D-Doctor I've got this lump in my throat
It's not the cigarettes that stunt my growth
There's voices inside my head, I need the medicine (I need the medicine)
D-D-D-D-Doctor I've got this lump in my throat
It's not the cigarettes that stunt my growth
There's voices inside my head, I need the medicine (I need the medicine)

Murdered or the murderers, we're all the same
Kingsmen or the poorly dressed, we're pawns in this game
Murdered or the murderers, we're all the same
Kingsmen or the poorly dressed, we're pawns in this game

D-D-D-D-Doctor I've got this lump in my throat
It's not the cigarettes that stunt my growth
There's voices inside my head, I need the medicine (I need the medicine)
D-D-D-D-Doctor I've got this lump in my throat
It's not the cigarettes that stunt my growth
There's voices inside my head, I need the medicine (I need the medicine)

songs.title: A Fight For Peace
songs.lyrics:
Hell walks the earth, his name is pain
I swear to God I've seen him
He's no stranger to me, I know him well
I'll write your name into the stars

We all have hell at our backs ready to take us
Salvation for these many scars
We all have dreams at night we're scared to speak of

They say everything happens for a reason
And we all have purpose here
(Can you hear me?)
Can you tell me what this all means
And why, God, am I here?

We are all the same, we fight the same fight
With different faces in different places
Demons by other names, they haunt us at night
With different faces in different places

If all roads lead home, then home is pain
I swear to God I've been there
This place gets stranger by day
Am I in hell? (Am I in hell?)

You've taken this a step too far
We all have hell at our backs ready to take us
We need you staying where you are
We all have dreams at night we're scared to speak of

They say everything happens for a reason
And we all have purpose here
(Can you hear me?)
Can you tell me what this all means
And why, God, am I here?

We are all the same, we fight the same fight
With different faces in different places
Demons by other names, they haunt us at night
With different faces in different places

If all roads lead home, then home is pain
I swear to God I've been there
This place gets stranger by day
Am I in hell? (Am I in hell?)

We all fight for peace of mind
We all fight for peace of mind

songs.title: Hell At Our Backs
songs.lyrics:
We all have hell at our backs
Haunting our dreams
In the beds in which we weep
We all have hell at our backs
Haunting our dreams
In the beds in which we weep

songs.title: Words Misread
songs.lyrics:
My cynicism was never yours to boast
You've greatly missed the point of what was said
Instead of questioning them, you just followed me
Robots, zombies, cattle herded by others' words

It was never meant to be like this
Breeding your anger was not my intention
Though that be the case, I've made this bed
And now we all have to weep in it

Hate, dissension between brothers of the same
Words meant to provoke thought, misread instead
Was I even right in my accusations?
My words are a weak foundation for your war

Hate, dissension, war
Did I start this?
Hate, dissension, war
I can't stop this
I can't stop this

It was never meant to be like this
Breeding your anger was not my intention
Though that be the case, I've made this bed
And now we all have to weep in it

If the pen is stronger than the sword
We will end the world with screens and keyboards
If the pen is stronger than the sword
We will end the world with screens and keyboards
If the pen is stronger than the sword
We will end the world with screens and keyboards

songs.title: Hands & Feet
songs.lyrics:
Speak of regretting and all the risk we take
Speak to the morning and when our eyes awake
The patterns are completing, the men they say we are
But as the sun is setting, I'll answer in the dark

When the world sings of all its trouble
And I hear all about its pain
I'll listen in, for its groans are not in vain

It's hard to remember how these dreams were made
When all the reasons and all the rules have changed
There's healing in His voice and freedom in The Name
But these misunderstandings we give up all the same

songs.title: Living The Dream
songs.lyrics:
Five years long
I've been running these open roads
Five years long
With no place to call home

Run away
From everything you've ever known
Run away
With no place to call home

Five years long
I've been running these open roads
Five years long
I have no place to call my home

Gain a friend, then I lose a friend
It doesn't matter 'cause tomorrow it will happen again
I'm losing touch with everyone at home
It's really hard when you're born, born to roam
Oh how I hate the line, "Outta sight, outta mind"
I'm on the search for the greenest grass that I will never find
Oh how I hate the line, "Outta sight, outta mind"
I'm on the search for the greenest grass that I will never find

I've run and run
I've drove and drove
Three hundred thousand miles of lonely roads
To see the ones I love at home
Move on and on without me, I'm just a memory

Is this the life I chose?
Have I chosen poorly?
Or has it chosen me?
Will it let me go now?
With action comes reaction
We're all a slave to something
Dreams aren't meant to be lonely
Will you answer me?
Is this heaven or hell?

Is this "living the dream"?
Or is this a living nightmare?

Five years long
I've been running these open roads
Five years long
With no place to call home

songs.title: The Death
songs.lyrics:
[feat. Chad Urich of Venia]

The world is on fire
And I've done nothing but watch it burn
The world is on fire
And soon it will take the last of us

I've heard it said before that boys play games and men live the truth
I've had it all wrong this whole time because I thought it was all braun and brute
All these tattoos and all these miles haven't made me a man just yet
I'm nothing more than a frightened kid demanding undeserved respect

The world is on fire
The world is on fire

I've been thinking a lot these days:
What if hell's not all fire and devils?
All the stuff they taught us as children just to keep us scared and wondering at night
What if we make our own hell every time we cause pain?
Every time we cause suffering there's hell on earth to pay

We are all murderers here
This is the life we chose, the life we lead
There's only one guarantee here
None of us deserves to be set free

We are all murderers here
This is the life we chose, the life we lead
There's only one guarantee here
None of us deserves to be set free

We are all murderers here
This is the life we chose, the life we lead
There's only one guarantee here
None of us deserves to be set free

We are all murderers here
This is the life we chose, the life we lead
There's only one guarantee here
None of us deserves to be set free

songs.title: The Setting Sun
songs.lyrics:
I've seen my share of heartache but I'm not the only one
My hopes and dreams are setting
They're setting with the sun

songs.title: Demigod
songs.lyrics:
[Music: Sampaio / Lyrics; Carvalho/Sampaio]

Shape reality in a wicked make believe
Elevate suffering into a piece of devotion
A servant to your weaker side
Neglect your will and life trough blind faith
Still unaware, its crooked path you follow
The pain must justify your silence, a new obssession
A downwards spiral, hands drip with your own blood
Behold you idol, your reason, your demigod
Sick communion
Covenant of filth
Rise up and hail, your own mortification
Present your flesh upon the altar, Sadistic offering
For all to see this cursed bond now fulfilled
Within your temple a monolith of decadence
Synthetic messiah of feeble minds
Oracle of the absurd, harvester of misery
Embrace the illusion of power sinking in arrogance
Desperate cries for silent lies
Worship your idol blinded by your devotion
Corrupted soul, defiler of life
DEMIGOD
Defiler of Life
Pray for Silent lies
Cerimonial Demise

songs.title: Hedonist
songs.lyrics:
[Music; Sampaio / Lyrics; Neves]

Self assured, pathetic loser
Convinced the world spins just for you
Above all laws, above all ethics
Narrow minded fool!
Egocentric monstrosity!
Virulent lethargy
Stagnant idiosyncrasy
Point your finger erratically
Shouting about hypocrisy
Twisted perception infects your mind
Know what you’ve done
Are you fucking blind?
Virulent lethargy
Stagnant idiosyncrasy
Shielded by
Excuses
Justified
By convenient lies
Convenient lies
LIES!
So satisfied spreading your disease
Inconsequently doing as pleased
Remain an infamous, moronic Hedonist
Sooner or later life will find a way
To put you in your place
Inconsequently doing as pleased, spreading your disease
Infamous! Moronic! HEDONIST

songs.title: Lobotomedia
songs.lyrics:
[Music; Sampaio / Lyrics; Neves]

Shoot your classroom
Kill some kids
The media will make you a celebrity

Hijack a plane
Kill enemies
Maybe someone will think you are a saint

Inverted values
Cracked morality

Your conscience is crushed down
Under the massive weight
Of mediatic agenda
That profits with disgraces!
Mass murder
Of autonomous thought

Homogenize the people
Nullifying their identities
Imposed convictions
Destroy individuality

Beware of what you try to achieve
For your life
You may find yourself in the dark
With no turning back!

Shoot your classroom
Kill some kids
NOW YOU’RE A FUCKING CELEBRITY!
Hijack a plane
Kill enemies
Maybe someone will think you are a saint

songs.title: Bane
songs.lyrics:
[Music; Sampaio / Lyrics; Neves]

My own shadow consumes me
Dragging me into agony
Awareness of reality
Conscience and rationality

Darkness overpowering
Leading to horrible sanity

Pain!
Corroding my brain!
Making me insane!
Leading me to bane!

Pain!
Corroding my brain!
Making me insane!
Leading me to bane!

The rotten desire, lust for living
It's only a disguised psychotic me

Whispers in my mind
Cry to my soul for death
Life runs off my veins
Losing all my breath

The voices in my head
Assuring me I'm not the same
Give up of yourself
Or make your own blood rain

I can't control
My hands
Can't wash
The bloodstains

songs.title: Enemy
songs.lyrics:
[Music; Correa/Camara / Lyrics; Neves]

No!
No matter what you say
You can't deny me
My right to express myself anyway I want to.
I won't just watch silently
To all this daily horror
Too many starve and die
As a consequence of our leaders lies!

I won't shut up!
our leaders steal!

I won't shut up!
our leaders kill!

I won't shut up!
our leaders lie!

I won't shut up
THEY ALL MUST DIE!
Hypocrisy
Denounce the flaws of humanity

Inconformation
Scream 'till someone hears you

More Hate
Urging
Blinding and scaring common citizens

Humans
Hollow hearts
They’ve long forgotten the value of life

Dead minds
Hollow hearts
Fear only leads to MORE HATE

I won't shut up
I know all your crimes
Humanity, you are Culprit
Of being

Your own worst enemy!
Your own worst enemy!
Your own worst enemy!
Your own worst enemy!

songs.title: A Red Nightmare Pt. I
songs.lyrics:
[Music; Sampaio / Lyrics; Neves/ Carvalho/ Sampaio]

Numb
In a self indulgent dream,
Trapped inside a cyclic routine
Absolute lack of interest

Darkness consuming within
Shackled to emptiness,
Pushing back the light of comprehension.

Face the abyss
As it stares back at you.
Feeling so right to be,
In the belly of the beast.

No need to flee from this
False security.
If you close your eyes
You may see what's real

No effort to understand
The hidden forces driving you
Mute pain screaming inside
Growing roots in the back of your mind!

Descending
To a realm of emptiness
Drowning
In a sea of pettiness
Dive
Head first in the filth
Soaked in corruption
See the pattern on the drips!

Own identity denied
Personality nullified
Homogenic state of mind!

songs.title: A Red Nightmare Pt. II
songs.lyrics:
[Music; Sampaio/Camara – Lyrics; Neves/Carvalho/Sampaio]

Release your mind
There's no more truth
Realize life's sinking inside you

Implanted thoughts guide hands
Blessed and cursed by ignorance

Everyday you swallow
A mouthful of lies
Fed by a self consuming dying system

Imbued Submission
Disgraced your own existence
Embrace the illusion
Give up all insurgence
Restrained by self denial
you remain...

Forsaken...
By the light of consciousness
Forsaken...
By the light of consciousness

Emerged in absence of questioning
Confused and afraid of change
Apathy for life, in a silent rage from your padded cell
You scream into a broken mirror of fragmented realities.

The breed of your own selfish dream – a fear that pushes you back
At war with yourself – truth has never brought you relief
An oath, out of anger
NEVER TO REMAIN

Forsaken...
By the light of consciousness
Forsaken...
By the light of consciousness

Consciousness – the illusion is shattered
Awaken to see your old dreams turn to nightmares!

songs.title: A Red Nightmare Pt. III
songs.lyrics:
[Music & Lyrics; Sampaio/Carvalho]

Tormented Wanderer
Awareness tears you apart
All you despise is everything you once knew
Fading, within an empty shell

Floating above the void
Wandering, searching
For answers untouchable by filthy hands

Cries of agony
Slowly deceasing the hope for a new beginning
Desperately trying to reach the surface of the pit
This tainted soil you sown
Brings the harvest of destruction
Nightmare reveals itself
As the key for your release

Surrounded by darkness
Shadows Lurking
Crawling the spine
Surrounded by darkness
Crawling the spine
Shadows Lurking
Lust for your blood

Spiraling down
Entangled by Your own Dark Roots
Inside this nightmare
All the flaws Once hid, Exposed!

Eyes bleeding truth, Staining red
Reflections of a former life
Distorted light no longer found
Through tinted glass of sight and sound
Embodiment of terror as you open your eyes
Abominations haunt your twisted mind
Live and Breathe

Flesh and blood they have risen today
Crimson tides shall emerge
Bringing life through decay

The sun has set before you
Silence awaits you in the shadows
Your nightmare turns RED
My nightmare turns RED
OUR LIVES STAINED RED FOREVER!

songs.title: Zub Zero
songs.lyrics: [Instrumental]

songs.title: Epic Fail
songs.lyrics:
This is the hour of revelation
The endorphine is rising
This is Euphoria
An anthem for Utopia
This is us ascending
Bound to fall again

At the end of the day
Between invocations
And instincts profane
We cross ourselves in shame in epic fail

This is the hour of revoking
The juggernaut is rising
This is our web of lies
In garments of filth
the naked truth is disguised
This is us us afraid
to recognize ourselves

At the end of the day
Between invocations
And instincts profane
We cross ourselves in shame in epic fail

Craving
Like a chosen race praying
Immortal reborn
Raging
Like sullen children waging
struggling stubborn

At the end of the day
Between invocations
And instincts profane
We cross ourselves in shame in epic fail

At the end of the day
United by instincts we bow in decay
When zero turns one
the trigger will come

songs.title: Rain Of Shards
songs.lyrics:
The strain has come at last
Revealed in water so pure
with every drop like razors
The burden will dissolve

In awe I stand
The air I drink
Vanguards of clouds
Caressing the ground

Though indifference I seek
Hatred is charming me
To taste damnation's kiss this night
To soar over pain and affliction
And the long lost silence within my mind

In the water's surge I await the dawn
If tomorrow is lost, let this be the day
To feel the ecstasy once again
I cast my face towards the rain

Court to the flame
Spoil to the grain
Vanguards of clouds
Caressing the ground

Evaporated memories rewind
Dashing on the ground as to remind
What yesterday forgot, tomorrow will recall
Once and for all

As the sense of reality fades away
My soul becomes one with the rain
Its shards grazing me like
Solemn hatred washing me free from memories

songs.title: Goddess In Dust
songs.lyrics:
The wings start to tremble
The ripping inside
The wages of treason not fading
Nor paying shelter for the gods

She hangs her head in agony
In a veil of shame she hides

All her creatures once marvelling
Now abandoned her grace
In the tunnels she flooded
Now she found her grave
The warmth that she gave
Now burning our eyes
And the song she intoned
Now sings itself

Away her breath is dying
A goddess in dust
My eyes so pale enshrining
The goddess in dust

She hangs her head in agony
In a veil of shame she hides
She shrives her sins so deathlessly
Mortality is nigh

No icon adorned by the charm of her eyes
Forgotten is her fraud and her lies
The hand that she filled
Carved a tombstone of gold
And the tongues that enthroned her
Breed verdict on her soul

Away her breath is dying
A goddess in dust
My eyes so pale enshrining
The goddess in dust
A ghost light now is dying
A goddess in dust
Eternity denying
The goddess in dust

Abandoned by the masses
Far away from heresy
The queen of solace
still lives on

Her words so adulating
still enthroned
in the hearts of her disciples
yearning for comfort

And as the dead bury the dead
They still gather her remnants
Digging in the cursed ground
Of this cemetery divine

In an attempt to revive her
Driven by remorse
In their last breath they joined
the funeral of a fallen deity

songs.title: Gallows Tree Thy Name
songs.lyrics:
Woken from a shallow sleep
Woken by remorse
A body like a shell so pale
swallowed all my thoughts

My memories so numb in vain
Displace this guilt and shame
A blurry void inside my head
Cannot deny
My conscience calls

Again I try
Repeating to deny
This is not me but some devious dream
Again these signs I can't combine
Still I'm accused by your eyes as you die

Paralyzed by tongues of fear
Your words they burn inside of me
The disgusting demons of my works
Claiming me
possessing me

Left within this sin alone
The moment of obsession is gone
My heart it bears this burden
Like the weight of stones
The gallow's call

Again I try
Repeating to deny
This is not me but some devious dream
Again these signs I can't combine
Still I'm accused by your eyes as you die

"For godly sorrow works
repentance to salvation
The mourning of the world
worketh death"

The knot is tightened
The traitor's frightened

Again I try
Repeating to deny
This is not me be but some devious dream
Again these signs I can't combine
Still I'm accused by your eyes as you die
My words betrayed this kiss of fate
Left nothing but one resolve
Thus consequent
This bitter end.

songs.title: Despair
songs.lyrics: [Instrumental]

songs.title: Ghost Light Dawn
songs.lyrics:
The loom gales of eternity
Like fallen angels guiding me
In absence of humanity
Returning to its purity

Crushed by the waves of density
The effort of humanity
The air conceives a breathing fear
The only sound I hear in this serenity

Salvation is in sight
Desolation is in sight
Radiation is in sight
The trees are glowing red this night

What anguish to drown
In this reckless poison
That spares our lungs from water
But scourges is its death in our eyes

I am the night to remember
(You pay a life to forget)
I am the tree of knowledge
I am grief, the salt in the tears you shed

Gone is the scourge divine
Hail the monster we created
Radiation crowned humanity
Reward us death by Karachay

How they wish they could end what they began
What with bloody hands they planned
This earth fulfils until the end

Behold these clouds are shaped with evil grin
Because we all did share their sin
And their conspiricy within

I am the saviour enchanted
The poisoned gold your hands will grasp
I am curruption on the formless void
For all that man creates will be destroyed

songs.title: Ruined
songs.lyrics:
This is hell
This is betrayal
breath is trembling
the body relieved
death conceived
after lust received
Repentance dies
as eyelids close
waiting for the final stroke

The face I meet in search for trust
beholding me with a traitor's eyes
The lips I feel upon my cheek
proclaiming all the traitor's lies

Repeat the lies I wish to hear
All the fraud I refused to fear
And while you feast upon this well of sin
Still I embrace
This faith is dead

This is pain
This is refrain

Eyes refuse to turn their gaze
Forced to endure within this daze
Sophism reigns
behold: the man
Ashes to ashes, flesh to flesh

Our hands into this bowl they sink
This chalice now is yours to drink
A toast to this iniquity
ruined by your own decree

Repeat the lies I wish to hear
All the fraud I refused to fear
And while you're caught in this veil of sin
Still I embrace
This faith is dead

I roamed this fields in search for you
To find a wreck of shame and emptiness
Like a waste of broken dreams
Dangling in the glowing autumn sun

Repeat the lies I wish to hear
All the fraud I refused to fear
And while you're caught in this veil of sin
I will refrain

Rebuke the lies I wish to hear
All the fraud
depart from me
And while you feast
upon this rope of sin
I will refrain

"The mourning of the world worketh death"

songs.title: Flames Leap High
songs.lyrics:
The flames of grief
now meet their enemy
And so does the pain at last
remembered as relics of trumpery
consumed by vanity
Let it pass

The mystery of faith
disguised in clothe of despair
Angst in the eye of the saint
the hard-earned soul is at stake

Begging at the gates of sanity
The sickness unto death to receive
Pondering inside of me
As the flames leap high
instead of tears to cry
The coming light I see

Will this effort and rage inside
calm now in this final hour?
Will this crown of thorns I wear
Turn out to be refuge or misery

Begging at the gates of sanity
The sickness unto death to receive

All I am – all I want
Vanity
All I hope – all I fear
Vanity
All I curse – all I bless
Vanity
All I speak – all I hush

All I know – all I doubt
Vanity
All I sow – all I reap
Vanity
All I pass – all I fail
Vanity
All I gain
All I lose
Compared to you

songs.title: The Great Escape
songs.lyrics:
Forsaken ground,
Deprived from sleep
Another desolate morn awakening me

Not a bit of the course I know
But without fail
From the shores of home I go
Stop counting the days,
Drop your ticking conscience
Bound to time and space

Silence falls, my mind stands still,
No one did nor ever will
Remember my name

 [Solo: Bruni]

This is the great escape
This is a dreamer's dream
This is a picture of misery
Defying the storms of vanity

A distant voice from afar I hear
The wish to turn like siren's song
Is tempting me.

Swallowed by rain
As time stands still
No one did, not even you will
Remember my name
Remember my name

 [Solo: Maas]

I'm heading to the unknown
No destination far enough.
No leaving, no arriving,
All aim is overboard
I stray into your silence
Raised is my flag of white
I beg for termless asylum
Solaced by your face I see
In lucid visions yearning for me
I close my eyes
Taste theses memories set alive

I am the drop-out dreamer
If I roam or if I stay, no one misses, nor did
Nor ever will remember my name

This is the great escape
This is a dreamer's dream
This is a picture of misery
Defying the storms of vanity

A journey doomed to failure
Exodus of broken dreams
The call of the lost ones
Sound of the void
Beckoning me

songs.title: Intoxicated
songs.lyrics:
I have called the storms
A summoning
To turn the air in motion
Like those remorsed
Calling home their fear

Spirits chanting in the air
Divine anticipation
Waiting for a night sublime
Regaining mortality

And as I saw the sky tearing apart
To liberate the pests we cast aside
Like a thousand sins raining from above
Leading all the seeds loss to light
A silent force

Dawn of the disgraced
A scent of scorn inside this deprivation
The host remorsed weathering so fierce

What a heavy heir to bring
A fate so devastating
Remnants of anxiety
Delusion becomes reality

Born, scared away
Blamed, ashamed
The sins of my hands
Grown, 'live and well
A portant sent to rend
Heralding moribund

 [Solo: Bruni]

Though freeze in this
Magically attracted disaster
Storms will enforce retribution
The raining of sorrows

songs.title: The Atonement Ship
songs.lyrics:
Rain upon the shoreline
Ensnaring waves around
Blackened shadows mirror warning
I can hear the waters pound

A ship is coming closer
Charged with nothing but despair
Under flag of sorrow sailing
Hear the mission it declares

We trade your lies and greed
We wash your bloodstained hands
The shame of your desires
Introduced to foreign lands

The atonement ship is coming
Cast your load of sins on board
Pray it may run aground
On distant shores it may be found
Spread fear and tragedy
A wrecker's agony

We're on our saviour's mission
We carry all your weight
We don't ask for commission
Remorse is our forfeit

We bring rage and obsession
We will return one day
The debt of your confession
Your children then will pay

The atonement ship is coming
Dim the light and hide your face
Here it may run aground
Upon this shore it will be found
Return us fear and tragedy
A generation's agony

The atonement ship is coming
Guideless drifting on this ocean
Drowning, floating in this sea
Scourging the waters
With pain and agony

songs.title: Lost
songs.lyrics:
Hold on my friend
You may understand
The pain that kept
My restless mind from sleep

We cannot share my friend
The heritage we spent
Back in the days that
Removed your grace from me

Where is your light to guide us home
Do you remember
We're on our own

I see your face
In this fragile embrace
And I still believe
Do you?

In every dream I near you
It's like through glass I see you
Desperately struggling for my soul

In your hypocrisy
Your prayers so selfishly
Driving me farther from the cure

I am lost in my ways
My mistakes
I have torn
I have fallen from grace
In this rage
I denied
I am

Where is your light to guide us home
Do you remember
We're on our own
I see your face
In this fragile embrace
And I still believe
Do you?

Don't weep for me
In this moment of peace
I will persevere
Will you?

 [Solo: Maas]

songs.title: The Concrete Lake
songs.lyrics:
Snow is melting
Melting down
Ready to grow
Ready to blow
Sway the sediment

Another harvest is at hand
Dead is who died
And dead who survived
This ground is desolate

Upon this shore
Where hope and dreams
Are covered with concrete

Another spring
Emerging radiance
Ready to spread
The blossom of death

Seeds are spawning without a warning
You betrayed our fate
We are dead and decayed

Upon this shore
Where hope and dreams
Are covered with concrete
Where life is but insanity,
One hour so severe
Death is around here

 [Solo: Bruni]

I am the night to remember,
You pay a life to forget
I am the tree of knowledge
The salt in the tears you shed

songs.title: The Uniqueness Of Two
songs.lyrics:
And so it's done
What once was two
Now one and one

My time has come
In this case of doubt
The doubt has won

Intimate for so long
Far beyond the right and wrong
And as time passes by
Waiting for a sign
Alluring me, alluring you

And still I cry for you
And still I lie to you
And I cannot rewind
Hiding here behind these lies
And I can't revive
The uniqueness of two

Don't trust the words I say
The certainty that I display
Stuck in this debate
Tormenting inside my head

Though it used to seem
The equation was complete
Time obliterates
Whatever is at stake
Where is the gain
In losing you

And I cannot rewind
Hiding here
Behind these lies
And I cannot disguise
What you said was...

Equating alone
I reap what I've sown
Estranged from my home
Disaffected is my soul

 [Solo: Bruni]

I just cannot survive
Behind these lies
And I just cannot revive
I just cannot disguise

songs.title: Prejudice
songs.lyrics: [Instrumental]

songs.title: Judgement
songs.lyrics:
There is beauty in the tears
From eyes so cold
And courage in a soul
Weathering the fraud

There is a sparkling
In the eyes refusing lies
Trust in me

Gates open wide
To the fortress of our minds
Still there is truth to find
Under the burden of our lies
Ruthlessly disguised
These rampant thorns still grow
As we rehearse the fall

There is appearance we pretend
A fragile wall that we defend
There is betrayal that we adore
A trace of wisdom we ignore

There is hope in every word
Comforting our souls
And blessing in a vow
To cast away the doubt
There is a power in our breath
To raise the dead
Come with me

Gates open wide
To the fortress of the mind
Still there is truth to find
Under the burden of our lies
Ruthlessly disguised
These rampant thorns still grow
As we rehearse the fall

Betrayal in a kiss, deceit in the kind
The remnants of malice in an honest advice
The dangerous intension in doing the right
A veil of delusion in euphoric delight

There is rain for the droughty
A flame for a spark
There's still intervention, the act of god
There's purge in the fire
In anguish refined
From ashes of judgement
Tomorrow's truth will rise

Times of grace will come as we fall

songs.title: Purgatory
songs.lyrics:
I live inside a dream
Inside my head
Though I never sleep
I am the silent scream
Inside my head
I am the past that will remain

Tell me when will I be home
From this purgatory
Punishment and fear
How many sins to suffer still
Inside this purgatory
Sublimate my will
Is there anybody out there
Praying for my soul

I swelter by the flames
Inside my head
Stigmatized by scorch
I stubbornly confess
Inside my head
I am dying but never dead

Revived to frighten the sinner
Resistant to fear the saint
Revived to regret the penitent
Reduced to fire the elements

songs.title: Remains Of Misery
songs.lyrics:
I've been here before
My shadows still roaming this place
I've seen it before, the open door

I have been here before
The alley where memories stray
Through fences and thorns,
A gateway to myself

I sense the space, the smell of rust and mould
The sound in the air so familiar
Every step a quest so vague

Far away from anywhere
Without guide, no soul in sight
Following this barren path, the ages pass
Far away from this petty dreams
And busy schemes
But into wastelands of dignity calling me

This noble mossy doorstep
No footprints have adorned
This place so lost untouched for ages
The wet and dropping jutty watering my face
From dusty lattice windows
The scent of years escapes

Entering this treasure I have found
Gurgling and creeky it will sound
Dead for this world
Alive for my soul to breathe again

The beauty of decay
Remains of misery
Witnessing from corners around
The stories of loss and fate
I merge with calm and peace
Inside these walls of misery
Sheltered by the spirits around
My mind will be set free

Abode of my soul
Neglected, past remedy
Surrounded by this tangled mess
Of yellowed worn memories

I have been here before
Abandoned this place in haste
Never trusted that luring door
Revealing the upper floor

Climbing up the stairs to the unknown
Confrontating memories will be found
Left by this world
Delight for my soul
A son is coming home

songs.title: You Have No Idea
songs.lyrics:
We're always running late
But we don't give a shit
We'll show up when we want
You have no idea
Shit is getting done
All the kids in the neighborhood
Dancing in on their tippy toes
Watch out
Tossing turning bounce
We came from the underground
Spreading life into every crowd
This is to show you where we stand
And where we once stood
Let us show you what were made of

songs.title: Jacuzzi
songs.lyrics:
This is where we separate
And go our own selfish paths
This is the same shit
I always speak about
No matter how it changes
I still suffer
No matter how it changes
I keep moving on
Oh god I love this
Screaming my lungs out
I hope this gets to you now
Ill get under your skin
I hope you learned a thing or two from my words
They can guide you to the top
This will bring you what you want
Now I wish for more wishes
Try to tell me to fucking stop
I wish for more wishes
Keep this up reach your top
Now I have this in my hands
So what will I do stay or run away
Run away

songs.title: Look At It This Way
songs.lyrics:
We all know how we got here
Forget about introductions
Spitting out lies and truth in my face
Wipes our very existence from my eyes
Ill just let it go
This is how it starts
Now I'm standing on my own
No need for any rumors
So fuck them all
You'll have to just let it go
This will stick with us
For the rest of our lives
I know you're better than this
Because I know you better than them
I know you can rise above them all
Play the role that you want you be
Don't let them rot us away
This is what I call
The healing process In progress
This is what they'll say
That I'm naive and
I'm fucking out of my mind
And I'm lost for eternity
I don't give a fuck what they say
Because I'm already gone
I'm finding my way home
I'm already gone
You know I'm already gone
I'm already gone I'm done
so fuck them all

songs.title: Governor
songs.lyrics:
Since I was young
I never thought that I
Would have this mess inside my head
I don't have the guts to say it
That I may be lead to a fucking bitter ending
But I can't go back and remove what's wrong
I will learn to live on my own
And for that I thank you
What's said and done
We've made our vows
I promised myself that I
Would be a better man
In the long run ill learn from my mistakes
There was something I left behind
It was a person who made me feel alive
Yet I feel ugly on the inside
But I've found my place in life
Where I want to be
I'm sure of it now its a place of
Love and heart
I hope she knows how she means to me
If I could turn back time would I change anything? defiantly not.
Staring me in the face my better half
Well I hope you know
How you mean to me
All things aside its along stretch from here
But I'm in this for the long run
And we'll stay the same with nothing in our way
We'll have long nights spent right
Until the break of day
Showing all that we are
Something of beauty and grace
And we'll stay there all day.

songs.title: Something Different
songs.lyrics:
This is something new to me
I can't explain this feeling that I have
A mix of nausea and no assurance
Throwing caution away
Has never been me
I can't just sit here wasting time
I know I have a passion for this
But I fucking can't get rid of it
This feeling I have
Ah fuck it ill just go down with the ship
I can't just sit here thinking of what could be
Ill seize everyday,
ill live every moment in the moment
Because I'm alive and I find my self safe and sound in the music

songs.title: That Night At Doms
songs.lyrics:
I see my dreams up upon a shelf
It seems as though I can't reach
At least I can say that I made it this far
And stayed true to my self and I not
Listen to them
My mind is bursting with dreams and Motivation
Hope is not lost
I know I can persevere and rise above from the ashes
This is my dream true want and need
Ill pick up the pieces of what I call life and string them together to try to make sense
This is my time to shine

They sleep for years slowly growing old
And when their youth has died away
She leaves their bodies out in the cold

Hush don't break the silence
Lock your windows tight
Beware the song of the witch in the night

The sounds of mourning cries will terrify
They echo 'cross the land through every tow
Their tears of could fill an endless sea
In them their parents drown

Hush my precious children
Lock your windows tight
Beware the song of the witch in the night

songs.title: Kill That Bitch
songs.lyrics:
We've known each other for a few short years
But seeing you with her brings me to tears
I know we both made a painful choice
But listen to the sincerity in my voice

I've come up with a plan that we can use
Perfectly logical and nothing to lose
There's only one possibility
You've got to kill that bitch and run away with me

You know I'm the one that you adore
I've got more cojones than that whore
I'm not asking you to go on a crime spree
Just this once kill that bitch for me
Just this once kill that bitch for me

She won't see it coming if done right
We could make it out of town tonight
I've got a few trash bags we can use
Just try not to get the plan confused

We've always talked about running away
We never thought we'd ever see the day
And if tonight we can make it to Vegas
We could get Alice Cooper to marry us

So bury her behind the Pizza Hut
You know I'm better than that slut
We'll always love each other right baby
Hurry up, kill that bitch for me

Kill her, kill her
Kill her, kill her
Kill her, kill her
Kill her, kill her

You know you wanna
Kill her, kill her
Just do it for me
Kill her, kill her
Kill her, kill her

You know I'm the one that you adore
I've got more cojones than that whore
We'll always love each other right baby
Just this once kill that bitch for me
Just this once kill that bitch for me
Just this once
Kill her, kill her

songs.title: Murderous Horde
songs.lyrics:
The sun is setting slowly
The dark consumes the light
Mankind is sleeping sweetly
They won't last through the night

They think themselves so righteous
They do not think we're real
But they'll believe the stories
When we make them scream, squeal

Throngs of your death await you now beneath your feet
We see you for what you are; weak pathetic meat
You don't comprehend the strength, the power in our claws
Mankind's cries silenced in between our mighty jaws

Murderous horde

Tunnels vast and complex
They spread throughout the land
Consuming every creature
It's all part of the plan

Blood as black as entrails
Bones all picked white clean
We'll eat the flesh of all things
Rabid killing machines

Throngs of your death await you now beneath your feet
We see you for what you are; weak pathetic meat
You can't comprehend the strength, the power in our claws
Mankind's cries silenced in between our mighty jaws

Murderous horde

Fear our massive numbers
Creatures great and small
Screaming out for mercy
We'll eat you where you fall

Plotting our succession
Tearing, piercing flesh
Man and woman no one's safe
From bloody putrid breath

Battle whets my hunger
Black and unignored
Bloodlust pushes further
It feeds a vicious horde

Drums of death await you down beneath your feet
We see you for what you are; weak pathetic meat
You can't comprehend the strength, the power in our claws
Mankind's cries silenced in between our mighty jaws

Murderous horde

songs.title: A Sound Of Thunder
songs.lyrics:
When the legacy began
We went faith swords in hand
To command the exultation
Of hell's greatest creation

We fought the battles
With the fury of the damned

Fighting demons and wizards
Through deserts oceans and blizzards
Dragon's blood burned the mountainside
The beasts had nowhere to hide

The battles won
We would dance upon their graves

We bow before the fury of the gods
Unbelievers torn asunder
Legendary tales, from hell's heart we hail
Bringing a sound of thunder

Upon the Sabbath men of war
To save the Maiden, this we swore
An endless violent endeavor
Blessed by the Priest we'll fight forever

We bow before the fury of the gods
Unbelievers torn asunder
Legendary tales, from hell's heart we hail
Bringing a sound of thunder

songs.title: Out Of The Darkness
songs.lyrics:
Tracing the night, demons dance around
An army of one, a mortal never found
Left all alone to fight the living dead
Losing control, trying to stay ahead

Don't be fooled by the look in their eye

Look through the mist the storm is coming near
A lone flash of light the faces reappear
The cold kiss of death will bring eternal life
Betrayed by the world, cut by a broken knife

It's only a heartbeat away
You'll have no more reason to stay

The time will come to break away from here
Defend your heart, your place, you'll never fear
The clash of truth and lies that bring you down
One step to the edge brings you closer to the ground

Out of the darkness the lost souls will run
Mortal survivors all turn to the sun
If you look back it could be your last time
The punishment will fit the crime

Temptation lurks, unseen energy
The lust of the eye, ageless synergy
Nowhere to run, no time to be afraid
Is this the end, is this a masquerade

Is it too late to turn back the time

Voices are clear, calls from far away
Forces collide, one clean getaway
Break of the dawn leaves you all alone
The story is dead, the ending never known

What you don't understand you will find
Is a place you should leave far behind

The time has come to break away from here
Defend your heart, your place, you'll never fear
The clash of truth and lies that took you down
Scatters like ashes over some unsacred ground

Out of the darkness the lost souls will run
Mortal survivors all turn to the sun
If you look back it could be your last time
The punishment will fit the crime

The time will come to break away from here
Defend your heart, your place, you'll never fear
The clash of truth and lies that bring you down
One step to the edge brings you closer to the ground

Out of the darkness the lost souls will run
Mortal survivors all turn to the sun
If you look back it will be your last time
The punishment will fit the crime

songs.title: Calat Alhambra
songs.lyrics:
In the year of 1492 at the zenith of her reign
Isabella and Ferdinand would unite beloved Spain
They battled through Granada and captured Muhammad
Clad in steel the Castilian queen led her army in the name of God

Through ten long years she warred with them
And took it piece by piece
Granada fell first at her sword
Followed by the whole south east

She made her men kneel down in prayer
Upon the battlefield
She called forth God's protection
Blessing every Spanish shield

Fernández de Oviedo dijo
Para a lo it a la hablar, era divino

Emerged from royal blood
A vicious queen who reigned with steel
Warring in the name of God
Isabella de Castile

She led her men through every fight
Dauntless was her will
She ended la Reconquista
Her destiny fulfilled

Ella conquistó la tierra con la espada en la mano
Su valor se demostró

Emerged from royal blood
A vicious queen who reigned with steel
Warring in the name of God
Isabella de Castile

The Nasrid dynasty was gone
She burned it to the ground
Isabella's royal psalms
A sweet and bloody sound

Amidst the triumph of her rule
None denied her wrath
The screams of thousands led her way
Their bodies paved her path

La gente elogió su reina
Para ella era una santa

Emerged from royal blood
A vicious queen who reigned with steel
Warring in the name of God
Isabella de Castile

songs.title: Fight Until The End
songs.lyrics:
Walking the desert
Deep in the sun
Third degree bums and
Nowhere to run

Break through the barrier
Of the human will
Don't let fate guide your hand
It's begging for the kill

Brace yourself against the agony
Battle through the pain
Use the will to survive
You will rise again

Sailing the ocean
The weather is bad
You have no say
If Neptune is mad

Your weakness calls for you
He's begging to be heard
Don't let him pull you through
Just ignore his words

Brace yourself against the agony
Battle through the pain
Use the will to survive
You will rise again
Don't surrender to the fear
You have much to defend
Bare your fists, challenge fate
Fight until the end

Though the fire bakes your flesh
And drains you of your mind
Face the world with open eyes
And never go blind

Fighting the lions
Proving your worth
Defending the value
Of your own birth

Break through the barrier
Of the human will
Don't let fate guide your hand
Ifs begging for the kill

Brace yourself against the agony
Battle through the pain
Use the will to survive
You will rise again
Don't surrender to the fear
You have much to defend
Bare your fists, challenge fate
Fight until the end

songs.title: This Too Shall Pass
songs.lyrics:
Time will take its toll once again
Silent cries of fate will never end
Hungry souls walk free but stand alone
All alone

Sing some ancient song, truth or lie
Worship good or evil but don't ask why
Hopes and dreams are shattered like broken glass
But don't you forget this too shall pass
This too shall pass

Lurking in cold shadows, tortured ones
Scared to show their faces to the sun
They jump out from the darkness to find their homes
Only to realize that home is gone
Home is gone for good this time

Born to fly so high
Thrown down by stormy skies
Pray for gentle winds
To tame this killing tide once again

Longing deep inside
Look around with hungry eyes
Change will come at last
But just like before this too shall pass

songs.title: Discovery
songs.lyrics:
I hear the sound of quiet voices coming nearer
They're telling me that I can never stay
The shades of light above my head are shining clearer
I'm capturing the spirit of the day

This day
Take me away
This long forgotten day
Freedom fighter
Rise up and conquer
Now or never
Alive once again

Discovery
Hold the diamonds of life in your hands
Just don't cast them away
Discovery
Hear the calling of distant lands
But there's a price you must pay
Discovery
Cast away those ancient fears
Discover your time

I see the rivers of your ancient lands flowing
Clouds create imaginary sights
No crooked hands are reaching up to buy the heavens
The mountains rise to catch the early light

The morning light
Shining bright
The miracle of light
Snow and rain
Seasons change
Freedom range
Smiling back again

Discovery
Hold the promise of life in your hands
Just don't cast it away
Discovery
Live the dream of a world without end
There's no price to pay
Discovery
There's no reason to live in fear
Fate will never call

Hear the cries
Broken ties
Calling loud
Walking proud

Seeds of change
Can't rearrange
Lost in time
Forgotten sign

Gone away
No price to pay
Warrior's eye
Must never die

songs.title: The Queen Of Hell
songs.lyrics:
Welcome brothers, sisters
I am your queen of hell
Come with me I’ll show you
The burning place we dwell

We will show no mercy
A nation of the cursed
So arm yourselves, join the cause
Satiate your thirst
We won’t be denied
We’ll conquer mankind

Follow me as we march forth
Do as I command
Red and black our banners wave
As we march across the land

Bow down before me the queen of hell
Be worthy of my chains
Know that to serve me means glory as well
Your queen of desire and pain

No man can defeat me
They’ve tried before and failed
They cower at my feet now
And tremble at my wail

We will show no mercy
I have no tears to shed
Only those of metal
Can wear the black and red

Don’t fear the dead
There’s blood to shed

Follow me as we march forth
Do as I command
Red and black our banners wave
As we march across the land

I know that you can hear me
I will not be ignored
My army of the damned will see
The metal age restored

Bow down before me the queen of hell
Be worthy of my chains
Know that to serve me means glory as well
The queen of desire and pain

Make your salute to the queen of hell
Join my ranks of steel
An army of metal to conquer mankind
And force the world to kneel

songs.lyrics:

I am your queen of hell
Come with me I’ll show you
The burning place we dwell

We will show no mercy

So arm yourselves, join the cause
Satiate your thirst
We won’t be denied
We’ll conquer mankind

Follow me as we march forth

Bow down before me the queen of hell

Your queen of desire and pain

Only those of metal

Don’t fear the dead

Follow me as we march forth
Do as I command
Red and black our banners wave

I know that you can hear me
I will not be ignored
My army of the damned will see

Bow down before me the queen of hell

Know that to serve me means glory as well

songs.title: Trashed
songs.lyrics: [originally by Black Sabbath]

songs.title: Let's Start A Fire
songs.lyrics:
Gather the kindling
I'll bring the flame
Let's start a fire
No one can tame

Limits are endless
I've seen it free
You don't know fire
'til you know me

Let's start a fire
Let's watch it grow
Through the flames
We'll disintegrate
All that we know

The houses smoking
The forest dead
Curled up in ashes
After what you said

Photos and letters
Reduced to dust
Broken by misery
We do what we must

Let's start a fire
Let's watch it grow
Through the flames
We'll disintegrate
All that we know

Let's feed the embers
There's no retreat
Illuminate our lives
Stand within the heat

Let's start a fire
Let's watch it grow
Through the flames
We'll disintegrate
All that we know

Let's start a fire
Out of control
Destroying all it touches
Ignite my soul

songs.title: Power Play
songs.lyrics:
Heavy swords are drawn this day
Old boundaries are gone
The brutal march is underway
The huddled mass will move as one

Keep your eyes open day and night
Don't try to run
The enemy is there
Faded armor shining bright
Blood brothers rush the field
They do not understand

No time
For hesitation
Think fast
You’ll make it back alive
No fear
Too late for you to run away

Can't wait
For some miracle
Shout out
Scream the battle cry
Get up
Be a part of the power play

Fight the strong enslave the weak
Another treaty burned to dust
The minds of peace don't dare to speak
There's no one left that we can trust

Keep your eyes open day and night
Don’t have to run
The enemy is dead
Faded glory shining bright
Blood brothers fall apart
They do not understand

No time
For hesitation
Think fast
You’ll make it back alive
No fear
Too late for you to run away

Can't wait
For some miracle
Shout out
Scream the battle cry
Get up
Be a part of the power play

songs.title: Time's Arrow
songs.lyrics:
Another stormy night
Another stormy vision
One chance to run
A broken body stands alone
No fantasies
No dead end fascination
An open window
To the world of the unknown

So many days spent in isolation
Walk a twisted line
To the edge of sanity
Unlock the mystery
Of time in all dimensions
To see with mortal eyes
The limits of reality

A secret passageway is there
I’ve got to find out where

Time's Arrow
Please take me
And change my destiny
Time's Arrow
Bring life back
To what it used to be

Countdown is done
Generators spark
And twist with power
I close my eyes
Looking for a miracle
A blast of energy
Rushing through my veins
No second thoughts
I cast away these broken chains

Defied the science of the day
No one listens anyway

Time's Arrow
Please take me
And change my destiny
Time's Arrow
Bring life back
To what it used to be

All I see in front of me
Parallel eternity
Suddenly I start to pray
This will never fade away

Fading from my tired sight
Endlessly into the night
Spirits from beyond the grave
I can never save

Swept away so from me
Standing silently
Rising up into the sky
Right before my eyes

Precious memories
Don’t leave me
Can’t turn back
My world is turning black

The final curtain of this play
Doesn’t matter anyway

Time's Arrow
Please take me
And change my destiny
Time's Arrow
Bring life back
To what it used to be

songs.title: I Will Not Break
songs.lyrics:
I've heard a thousand voices
Telling me to do as they say
Forcing their hands to
Put me on display

I will not submit
I won't be their prey
I'm not your fool
I make the rules

I will not break
I am the only master of my fate
You can't control me
Nothing in this world can hold me

I have the voice
How  and when I use it is my choice
I won't be silent
But I might be violent

You have the illusion
That yours will be the hand that guides my path
Don't try to deny it
Those words might be your last

You are not worthy
To feel all of my wrath
I won't let you inside
I'd rather die

I will not break
I am the only master of my fate
You can't control me
Nothing in this world can hold me

I have the voice
How and when I use it is my choice
I won't be silent
But I might be violent

Eyes gleam watching
Craving but not seeing
My life
My Role
My dreams and my soul

I will not fall again
Strength carried deep within

I will not break
I am the only master of my fate
You can't control me
Nothing in this world can hold me

I have the voice
How and when I use it is my choice
I won't be silent
But I might be violent

songs.title: Broken Bridge
songs.lyrics:
Been running away
High on the night
Looking for something
Nothing's in sight

Memories
More dead dreams to face
Hoping for some peace
Can't stay in this place

Laughing and crying
Driving way too fast
Cross that broken bridge
It won't be the last

Trying to forget
Time and time again
Need to get to the other side
Don't care how or when
Don't care how or when

I feel the beat
A forgotten song
Shoved it away
I guess it was all wrong

So far removed
Forever gone I fear
But I keep this reckless pace
'til the coast is crystal clear

Laughing and crying
Driving way too fast
Cross that broken bridge
It won't be the last

Trying to forget
Time and time again
Need to get to the other side
Don't care how or when
Don't care how or when

songs.lyrics:
Welcome brothers sisters
I am the queen of hell

Come with me I'll show you
The burning place we dwell

We will show no mercy
A nation of the cursed
So arm yourselves
Join the cause
Satiate your thirst
We won't be denied
We'll conquer mankind

Follow me as we march forth
Do as I command
Red and black our banners waive
As we march across the land

Bow down before me
The queen of hell
Be worthy of my chains
Know that to serve me
Means glory as well
Your queen of desire and pain

No man can defeat me
They've tried before and failed
They cower at me feet now
And tremble at my wail

We will show no mercy
I have no tears to shed
Only those of metal
Will wear the black and red
Don't fear the dead
There's blood to shed

Follow me as we march forth
Do as I command
Red and black our banners waive
As we march across the land

I know that you can hear me
I will not be ignored
My army of the dead will see
The metal age restored

Bow down before me
The queen of hell
Be worthy of my chains
Know that to serve me
Means glory as well
Your queen of desire and pain

Make your salute
To the queen of hell
Join my ranks of steel
An army of metal
To conquer mankind
And force the world to kneel

songs.lyrics:
Gather the kindling
I'll bring the flame
Let's start a fire
No one can tame

Limits are endless
I've seen it free
You don't know fire
'til you know me

Let's start a fire
Let's watch it grow
Through the flames
We'll disintegrate
All that we know

The houses smoking
The forest dead
Curled up in ashes

Photos and letters
Reduced to dust

Let's start a fire
Let's watch it grow

We'll disintegrate

Let's feed the embers

Let's start a fire

Let's start a fire
Out of control
